name: icon-visibility
objective: Icon is visible in gnome status area of top menu bar
description: Icon of  ConnMan extension should be visible in gnome status are of top menu bar.

steps.description: From the desktop, check that ConnMan extension icon is visible in top menu bar

author: zingile

name: menu-visibility
objective: Menu of the ConnMan extension is visible
description: Menu of the ConnMan extension should be accessible when user click on the ConnMan extension icon in gnome status area of top menu bar.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the ConnMan extension icon

author: zingile

name: services-list
objective: List of Wifi available neworks is visible
description: List of available network services should be visible in the ConnMan extension menu.
pre_condition: Wifi technology is disabled (Wifi Switcher is toggled on 'O')

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the ConnMan extension
Toggled the Wifi switcher button to enable the Wifi technology
steps.expected: Wifi switcher is toggled on 'I' and menu closes
List of available Wifi services is visible

author: zingile
